summary: Roombas deals are here at Amazon, with record low prices on the the Roomba j9+ Combo, j7+ Combo, and Roomba s9+.

title: Get up to 28% off Fitbit fitness trackers on Prime Day
content: As of July 15, you can get $70 off a Fitbit Sense 2, and $40 off a Fitbit Versa 4 smartwatch, as a part of Amazon's Prime Day sales.
summary: As of July 15, you can get $70 off a Fitbit Sense 2, and $40 off a Fitbit Versa 4 smartwatch, as a part of Amazon's Prime Day sales.

title: Listen up: Beats Studio Pro noise-cancelling headphones are half off for Prime Day
content: Get Beats Studio Pro headphones at their Prime Day 2024 price of $169.99, their lowest price ever.
summary: Get Beats Studio Pro headphones at their Prime Day 2024 price of $169.99, their lowest price ever.

title: Apple's fancy Studio Display is $300 off for Prime Day — a new all-time low
content: The Apple Studio Display is on sale for $1,299.99. That's a nearly 20% discount and a new all-time low.
summary: The Apple Studio Display is on sale for $1,299.99. That's a nearly 20% discount and a new all-time low.

title: Over 1TB of data stolen from Disney, allegedly by anti-AI hacktivists
content: Hackers have stolen over 1TB of data from Disney
